io.micronaut.transaction.interceptor

Interface TransactionAttribute

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TransactionDefinition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTransactionAttribute

    public interface TransactionAttribute
extends TransactionDefinition
    This interface adds a rollbackOn specification to TransactionDefinition. As custom rollbackOn is only possible with AOP, it resides in the AOP-related transaction subpackage.
    Since:
    16.03.2003
    Author:
    Rod Johnson, Juergen Hoeller
    See Also:
    DefaultTransactionAttribute

    • Method Detail

      • getQualifier

        @Nullable
java.lang.String getQualifier()
        Return a qualifier value associated with this transaction attribute.

        This may be used for choosing a corresponding transaction manager to process this specific transaction.

        Returns:
        The qualifier
        Since:
        3.0

      • rollbackOn

        boolean rollbackOn(java.lang.Throwable ex)
        Should we roll back on the given exception?
        Parameters:
        ex - the exception to evaluate
        Returns:
        whether to perform a rollback or not
